txt.en:
'Govach sent you, didn't he? Hah! That man never stops worrying about me. I simply don't wish to leave empty-handed. The trees in Fleetmire have good wood, and there are folks in Melgobas who cannot travel as far as I can for such quality.

'Unfortunately, the Corsairs -- or rather, their actions -- have been a persistent thorn in my side. Thanks to their excessive woodcutting there, the bog-lurkers have become aggressive.

'I'm no fighter; I'd sooner find my death trying to wield my axe against anything that breathes, but you seem to be capable of defending yourself.'

'So many boats to fix and no wood to use... this isn't ideal. Where in the world is Dardreg?

'Ah -- you, traveller! Did you happen to travel here from the north -- past a lumber camp? My friend Dardreg told me he'd join me in Melgobas soon, but it's been days since I arrived. The Corsairs can't have raided the camp... right?

'Could you make sure he's all right? Surely the trees here can offer the same quality of wood that he seeks!'
Find Dardreg at the lumber camp
You found Dardreg at the lumber camp in Anfalas.\n\nYou should talk to him.
Govach has asked you to find his friend Dardreg at the lumber camp north of Melgobas.
A carpenter in Melgobas is fretting over the fact that his friend hasn't arrived yet.
